name: Is it over yet?
description:
You and your friend have decided to organize a party at home. Keeping your guests entertained will be a lot more complicated than expected.

Cooperation game
It's a game that is played using a joystick, but can also be played on keyboard
3D

Is it over yet is a cooperation funny game in which players will have to keep control of the party by cleaning and taking care of the needs of their guests.

The more the evening goes well, the more people there will be, but beware, if guests are ever unhappy, the evening can quickly turn into a disaster.

Winning condition: Players will have to keep a maximum of people at home until the evening ends

Losing condition: If the minimum guest threshold is exceeded before the end of time, all the guests leave and the players loses.
